overview.ovdesc:
CR CR.INTRODUCTION.SOURCE CR.INTRODUCTION.SOURCE
At present there is limited functionality in Customer Relationship module for registering associations and groupings. CR.INTRODUCTION.SOURCE enables the grouping of customers who have relationship with the bank. No functionality is coded behind this table. The table covers only the addition of fields and the specified validations.

t.desc: Holds the details about the companies where introduction is available; linked to company table.

desc.p: Holds the details about the company in which the relationship is available.
This is linked to the COMPANY table. Mandatory Input.
This is the unique identifier of CR Introduction Source.
